website_summaries.verdict: You'll need a little time and caution to put this cover in place properly, but it will provide reliable protection for a mid-range price once it's on your vehicle.
pros: Has a soft bottom layer that protects your car windshield and finish
Three-way attachment system utilizes magnets, straps, and flaps to keep it in place in different types of inclement weather
cons: Be careful when putting it on your car - the magnets that secure it have been known to scratch paint
May not fit all large vehicles
Can cause leaks if you don't place the flaps properly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: In case you wonder if it works, here’s a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Canada at -24!
customer_reviews.text: Took to Canada and it was great to have a clean windshield when it was -24. (You read that right) The biggest surprise was that the snow and little ice fell right off and left us with a clean windshield cover to put back in the car. It was easy to put on even in fridged weather. Easy on, easy off - quality product, well made and in my mind cheap. What's not to like!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Stewart

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THIS WHEN IT’S RAINING!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited using this product until a rain came by and all it left behind is a mess inside of my car! The driver and passenger seat were soaking wet due to rain water got through the part where you would tuck the flaps into your car door! I’m really disappointed w it now!
customer_reviews.author: Baobao

customer_reviews.title: this is awesome! i've used it so much this winter and ...
customer_reviews.text: this is awesome! i've used it so much this winter and i've never had to scrape ice off or anything! the magnets are strong at the bottom and it fits perfectly across the whole windshield. honestly this made my leaving for work in the morning SO much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Heng

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative for “normal” sunshades
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help me keep the sun out of my car while being able to keep the multiple suction cups on the inside of my windshield. Between my phone charger and my dash cam I wasn’t able to use a normal sun shade any more. The unit goes on easily enough and stays securely in place via the magnets, side flaps, and the elastics. I worry the elastic will break over time but we’ll see. The one down side might be that it doesn’t fold up all that easily. I haven’t used it in the winter yet but I’m sure it would be good for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the car cool.
customer_reviews.text: Works much better at keeping my car cool than a old fashioned sun screen. I can put my windshield wiper blade on top so that and the two hooks and the too flaps it ain't going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Nissan Murano and similar size vehicles OK!
customer_reviews.text: Used on a Nissan Murano (2012) it fitts and works perfect in the winter for snow protection. I have yet to use it in summer but I expect similar performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Rands

customer_reviews.title: Nice to not having to scrape or clean off my ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! Nice to not having to scrape or clean off my windshield every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Harris

customer_reviews.title: leaked!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I misplaced my other windscreen cover and we were getting a wintery mess last night. Well it did as advertised, but when I sat down on my front seat, it was soaking from where the little wings are closed in the front doors! I'm hoping it was because the snow turned to rain and don't always happen, but be warned if you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Juliane 729

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the Car Cool
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It keeps the car much cooler in hot weather. I use it inside the car when it is windy...it doesn't fit great but it is big enough to stop the sun. I also use it outside the car depending on the weather and where I am. It's easy to throw on the windshield either way.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a sun shade. Haven't had a chance to use in Ice & snow yet but expect excellent results. Magnets on bottom only, needs more across top (roof area). I'll see if I can add some. May order another one for spouses car.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin  L  Shiver

customer_reviews.title: Very simple design that works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted this for her car because she works early and wanted her windshield frost,ice or snow free. So far it has worked exactly as planned. She loves it and it is a simple install. Basically has some weights along inside bottom of cover,straps that go around rear view mirrors, and ears flaps that go inside shut car doors. It is a heavy well made material that should last a long while.
customer_reviews.author: lexpostman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money,  but...
customer_reviews.text: First off, I waited a couple months before writing this review to thoroughly test it. For the price it's definitely worth it, plus it definitely fights frost on the windshield. The only problem is that if you opt for the magnet "upgrade" it's more of an afterthought. The magnets are strong and work well, but will rip through the material because the material isn't reinforced. You either have to use pliers to lift the magnet off your hood, or slide the magnet off and damage your paint (it's a strong magnet). You can see in the picture how the magnet ripped right through the black material.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Too small, bummer
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my minivan and the SUV. Looks like good quality, just too small
customer_reviews.author: Sherri B

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow, but not durable enough for ice
customer_reviews.text: This works really well, but it doesn’t hold up if you’re getting any significant amount of freezing rain or ice. The elastic was ruined after it got wet and froze while stretched out, and the one flap that is supposed be shut inside of the car door was stuck to the car with ice, and ripped off. It worked really well for the couple of snowy days before that, but it didn’t survive the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impress your friends and neighbors
customer_reviews.text: This snow cover works great. Covers my windshield completely. Although the magnets are small and I questioned their practically they worked great and held the cover down. I've gotten lots of compliments and queries about the cover and I have only one complaint. The straps that go around your mirrors are a little tricky to get off when frozen. I worry they might break but if you are careful you can pull them around the mirrors no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Grevor23

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I loved leaving work at 8pm on a cold, wintry Denver Friday night without having to spend an extra minute de-icing my windshield. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Erynn Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but needs some work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cover as a sunshield for my 2012 Ford Focus, and based on the measurements provided I thought it would be a little big. I actually was hoping it would be so it would cover my windows a little. In reality, it just barely fit. It covers my windshield top to bottom fine, but is 2 inches short side to side. The magnets on the bottom work great, but it really needs them on the top too, to prevent it from getting flipped over by the wind. Since it was only $10 I also ordered some extra magnets to attach. If you can find one with magnets on top and bottom I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Voelpel

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this it was solely for keeping the snow off my windshield so when I had to get up and go to work in the early morning I could just pull it off along with the snow and leave effortlessly. I will add that it did do a great job at keeping all the snow off my windshield however after the first snow storm I went to go take it off my car but then realized it completely froze to my windshield, I tried pulling it off and it started ripping apart. I only got to use it once and it obviously didn’t even last through one snow storm, I definitely wouldn’t recommend it🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Keeps snow, ice, leaves from collecting in the wipers deep outside vents.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use cover during the snowy, icy, windy Michigan weather. The magnets and straps around the mirrors kept it on windy days. Nice not to scrape the windshield. The cover will keep the pine cones and debris off from the fir trees. Also it will keep my car cool on the hot summer days. Love the way it covers my whole windshield and wiper blades. This is an EXCELLENT product for midsize to large suv's.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great Windshield Cover! Works well and fits great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! We live in the Wasatch Mountains (Utah, but we’re not Mormon :) This has been great to keep snow and ice from the windshields of our vehicles. It takes some getting used to remembering to put it on at night, but it beats scraping the windshield. I put mine in the back of the truck (shell) to dry and we hand the other on our fence to dry since it’s typically wet after removing and warming up.
customer_reviews.author: Holden Green

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we adopted an outdoor cat who loves to lay on my car. She also climbs up the windshield and goes over the top to get to the back. She scratched the windshield doing that, and fortunately I was able to buff it out. To prevent that from happening again, I bought this cover. I just drape it on, the magnets hold it in place, then pull it off and fold it up when I leave. It takes 3-4 seconds on each end, and that’s more than reasonable to keep the glass scratch free. I only use it inside the garage, but it stays in place every time.
customer_reviews.author: Cal P

customer_reviews.title: Elastic broke on first use: FIXED!  Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I was contacted by vendor who promptly addressed my concern: 100% satisfied. I was hoping this would be helpful for winter. It doesn't seem long enough to fold over the doorway as intended (this is on a Mazda CX5; not a large car). Of course, the snowstorm occurred just days after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob from New York

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Car Cool!
customer_reviews.text: My windshield is exposed to direct sunlight each and every day, and especially in 90+ degree weather, this windshield protector WORKS! Keeps interior COOL and protected!! I especially like that the windshield wipers are covered to protect from the heat. Very easy to put on and take off. I've tried at least 3 others and none of them worked as well as this one does! 3 protected magnets work well to keep the edge along the hood of the car secure without damaging the paint. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DreamchaserTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Too small for full sized pickup
customer_reviews.text: The description says it will fit a full sized pickup but it actually comes up quite short width-wise. Pictures show a 2011 Chevy Silverado. Coverage is fine for the height of the windshield except that it rides up very high on the windshield once the elastic is wrapped around the mirrors leaving gaps at the bottom. The elastic won't last long on this one as it is clearly stretched for all its worth to make it to the mirrors. The cover itself is a nice weight and quilted. It will work well enough for us but wish it fit better as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brindle

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Cool.. ordered on time. summer is ahead. like the silver mat. which gives lot of heat protection to the parking car. i liked the material and looks great and light weight one. see the description. once we use then we will know. it came in nice packing, its easy to take it out and put it back in the car. yes i liked it liked it. no words to say extra.
customer_reviews.author: Mahe

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, Saves time and labor
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to have this wonderful product. It is highly effective- saves a lot of time and labor. I do not like scraping ice before going anywhere. This is just a perfect solution for me at the windshield. I also like the way it is attached to the car- very easy and stable. A huge relief during the severe snow storm from last week.
customer_reviews.author: Arnob Banik

customer_reviews.title: Cool operator
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2014 Acadia that is parked outside all day. This shield not only keeps the sun off of the dash, the car is noticeably cooler in the HOT NM sun. I tried the sunshades that go inside the car but they are tricky to fit/fold and position. This is a 2 step 1 minute process to install and stays put all day. We don't get much snow here and I didn't buy it for that. The fit on the Acadia is almost tailored perfect. Really usable product.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeping Bear Electric Bikes

customer_reviews.title: They up grade from the 1st one I got and 1st lasted me over 2 summers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second 1 I have bought from this company the 1st 1 was not great.They took care of me in another way for customer service so I thought I'd give them a try from when I worked the other 1 out completely. Now this 1 I could even tell now is better than the 1st 1 I got from them so I should be really happy and use it I use it here in Las Vegas the block the sun out and it does the job really well
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!!!!! I wish I had found it sooner. It completely protects the front windshield from frost or dew (it doesn’t snow here but would work for that too), honestly you just pull off and the windshield is dry and clear! Easy to place, the flaps close inside the front doors and bands go around the mirrors-it will not move even on window nights. We have used on everything from full size suv to mid and small size sedans and it works well on all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Msm

customer_reviews.title: It works but the stitching holding a flap came out on last on last use so will be less effective.
customer_reviews.text: These windshield covers(2) have worked quite well for multiple times including another with blizzard conditions last night. While cleaning up I was so pleased how well it protected with freezing rain followed by snow and 40 mph winds I was getting ready to show how clean the glass was with a photo. As I pulled it off, the passenger side flap came off while removing it. The flaps are what keep it on the the winshield in a wind so it will be less effective. I would have contacted the seller first but it was not coming up.
customer_reviews.author: Wabash Wille

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I hate scraping my windshield for even a little bit of frost. I am a roll out of bed at the last minute kind of person and I love walking out in the morning and just sliding this thing off and going on my way! I was skeptical if it would be worth it but I would definitely buy again. I just use the elastic on the mirrors and don't even tuck in the flaps at the doors, though if you live in a windy area they would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: particularly useful
customer_reviews.text: The coat is very thick. It is no problem to use it in winter. The workmanship is good and the quality is good. The cost-effective baby is the right size. The anti-theft lock is particularly useful. The advantage of using the half cover is that it is easy to install and easy to remove. The trouble of using this car window is not frozen, and it is opened in the morning without any snow
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Thick Protective Windscreen Cover
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this cover for the windscreen I did not realise that there were 2 sizes and as a result I ordered the wrong one, a large one. Nevertheless I tried it on my Seat Altea and it completely covers the windscreen so that when it is frosty I have no need to scrape the frost and ice. Too early to say how it wears, and I have not taken it off wet yet so I don't know how it will dry or how long that will take. The good news is that, although I made a mistake it will fit my other car which is a large SUV
customer_reviews.author: Scott getz

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! I didn’t realize how much I really need this in Colorado. I was beyond tired of the ice rendering my wipers useless! And the ice that just won’t come off the windshield. I absolutely love that this covers the wipers. There are other in my apartment parking lot that don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Scrape your windshield NO MORE!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome frost/snow deterrent device!! It was a little awkward when using for the first time but after use and forming a system this windshield cover ROCKS IT! No more sweeping off snow! BUH-BYE FROST!!! Scraping the windshield is in the past!!! I highly recommend this windshield cover!!!!! ...now, if only it would start my car.... ;P
customer_reviews.author: sandy a.

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2011 volkswagon tiguan and it doesn't fit 100% but it does help. The only thing i noticed recently is that the cover is sticking/freezing to windshield leaving some of the product to my windshield. I like the magnetic feature tho and i think if someone has a smaller car would work fine and maybe nut to be used in very cold temps.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morlan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Material.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy & quick to place on & off windshield. It has two small flaps near the top for you to close inside the door and two straps that go around your side view mirrors. I like covered magnets to help hold it down on the bottom. Also I like that it's two sided. Black side up in the winter and reflective side up in the summer. Material is quality
customer_reviews.author: schoonz

customer_reviews.title: Well made, substantial, seems to be water repellant.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, but heavy-duty material that is quilted and well made. Seems to be water repellant. Easy to put in place, elastic bands fit over side mirrors with ease, doors close easily on side flaps. Very nice product. Arrived as expected, nicely packaged. Just fits my 2013 Toyota Corolla, without an inch to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Arrol

customer_reviews.title: 2004 toyota prius perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: 2004 toyota prius perfect fit. Simply loop the stretchy hoops on the mirror then close the other tab into the door and it will stay in place just fine. Keeps the sun out very well just like a light color blanket. Great for car camping/living.
customer_reviews.author: Great OwlTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Cosyzone, nice size and worked very well on early snowfall
customer_reviews.text: nice size, covers wipers, fits secure and worked very well on the first snow fall of the season.
customer_reviews.author: Donny from RI

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Snow
customer_reviews.text: The material is dense and seems like it will cover the wind shield well from the snow. I still need the chance to test it out since it has not snowed yet, but so far the material seems to be water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Min Li

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: You have to put the flaps through the door. If there is any NON frozen precipitation you will get water inside your car. Seldom get pure snow. Always some rain and sleet mixed in so this item is a bust. Ended up throwing in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Soonerpepa

customer_reviews.title: easy to install, good qulaity
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed, I live in the north so we get snow etc, this comes in handy especially after freezing rain, it protects the windows from freezing rain and having to use a scraper to remove ice from windshield. I bought 2 of them, barely fits on my 16 Silverado but the car no problem
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Ultimately not pleased
customer_reviews.text: I used this windshield cover twice and the first time was say since it was just a light snow. The second time was a mix of snow and ice and when i went to peel off the cover it completely ripped under the weight. I was baffled since this is what the product was designed for and it failed. I opted to get a refund but amazon replaced it easier than refunding so i will see how it fares the next time around.
customer_reviews.author: MorenMA

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Poor build quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size. I love how it installs. I love the price. But what I don’t love is the build quality. One of the “wings” which tucks under the door just ripped out of my hand when I tugged on it to make the cover tight before I closed the door. Shoddy build quality.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Cosyzone car windshield is exactly what I was looking for. It fits my new Mazda 6 perfectly. The magnets are covered and will not damage the paint. I used it over the weekend during a small snow storm and not a single problem with cleaning off the snow before removing it to drive.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: It may be an exaggerating to say this thing is "life changing" but winter has already hit us hard in Chicago and I've used this every day since I bought it. Perfect fit for my 2013 Camry. Be careful with opening your doors while the elastic straps are still on your sideview mirrors -- they seem to be a little fragile when stretched out that far.
customer_reviews.author: Poetic Discourse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. New Hampshire winters mean combinations of snow
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. New Hampshire winters mean combinations of snow, ice, frost, and wind. This cover withstands them all. Buyer note: Be sure to have the exact dimensions of your windshield before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Varnum

customer_reviews.title: Cool cover
customer_reviews.text: Ok cover for my berlingo multispace,no good if it's very windy with the snow we've just had Flaps about at the bottom even though the windscreen wipers were used to hold it down.Flaps that go inside the car could do to be a bit longer otherwise did the job before the strong winds came
customer_reviews.author: Page Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Worked the 2 times used
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time. Only used it two times before the straps that go over the rearview mirrors broke. Can't use in mild winds as the flaps did not stay in the door.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Juneau

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Living in South Dakota this held up to one snow storm before it tore. The fabric is thin and not much to it- could’ve just used a tarp to cover my windshield. Only nice part was there was coverings for the mirrors- but after I took it off from clearing the snow off it I won’t be able to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 Seasons Approved
customer_reviews.text: I live along lake Michigan in Wisconsin, where it gets hot in summer and obscenely cold and snowy in winter. And by winter, I mean early November through April. I love this thing. It's saved me so much time in the morning. I drive a 2016 Prius and it covers the windshield perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: H. C.

customer_reviews.title: Saves me so much time.
customer_reviews.text: I actually have two of these, one for the front windshield and one for the back. They're easy to use and keep my windshields from frosting up, which saves me a lot of time on cold mornings. Instead of scraping ice, I just pull these off, fold them up, plop them into my trunk, and off I go. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella! Walking hand in hand with the one you love...!
customer_reviews.text: My better half and self love to take walks together but in Florida, it rains almost every afternoon. Big, giant raindrops. Still, we don't like to miss our afternoon walk unless it's really storming but sploshing around each under our own umbrellas isn't exactly quality time together. This does the trick perfectly! Big enough to fit two grown adults with ease, it's also strong enough to hold up via wind bursts. Unlike other umbrellas, this doesn't cover half of a person while the other gets drips...nope, full coverage for two. Subtle styling goes anywhere. Very well made. Great umbrella that lets you enjoy the afternoon walks in the rain with the one you love!
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomerTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: i like this windshield a lot.it is very easy to put and take it off and it does the job as promised. the product is well done and the material is good quality
customer_reviews.author: geanina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Taken some pics and it shows you how other cars was like next to main and just after useing wipers once it shows u how clear my windscreen was first day off use so best not prize it to much lol but yes it does make life a lot easy in morning after leaveing work and spending 10mins every day cleaning windows this way to secs to take sheet off and your good to go while other still be there scraping they windscreen lol
customer_reviews.author: Reagan Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt fit a Chevy Traverse SUV. This review is simply for anyone who is looking to buy this for a similar size vehicle. It appeared decent quality though.
customer_reviews.author: THensley

customer_reviews.title: Too small. Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Did not cover my hatch back small cars windshield fully. Wouldn’t have bought if I had known it was far too small. The photos advertise it to cover small suv so I thought it would work. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small for SUB
customer_reviews.text: I like the material, but it’s a little small for SUV
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: could not with stand high winds
customer_reviews.text: One side became undone from driver side door during wind storm. Across the top flapped in the wind because the magnets are only 1/4". Not large enough to hold down the material. After removing the cover I found a small magnet on the car hood.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Snow great, Rain not!
customer_reviews.text: I had already left a 5 star review earlier, but now that I've used it while raining, I have to change my verdict. It works GREAT for just snow. However, we got rain that had the possibility of freezing, so I put it on & the flaps absorbed the water & ran into my car!!! My door speaker was covered in moisture. I'm hoping I don't have issues now that it is freezing temps. So bummed
customer_reviews.author: christina m. mcelhoe

customer_reviews.title: Size matched and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The summer of california is coming now, the heat and the sunshine is very strong all the year, and the sunshine may hurt my skin when I drive the car go out, so I bought this car sunshade blocks to protect myself from the UV rays. I am very satisfied with this block, it can Keeping my car cooler and comfortable when I get in the car. The size of the block is also every fit my car. The most important is that it’s very easy to install, just putting the block on the car window and closing door holding cover, that's it. I think it’s very convenient for me!
customer_reviews.author: jinliang wang

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It works well keeping Snow off the windshield this summer it is designed to the car, cool secures to the car smartly
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: My Windy, Snowy Rainy city
customer_reviews.text: I live in Chicago where we had the polar vortex and then the 55 mile an hour winds on 24 February 2019. This windshield cover stayed put through all of our bad weather we have been having in Chicago. I am loving it.😜. Thank you. I am very very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: LINZY

customer_reviews.title: Quality looks good and does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that I bought this, because we had an unusually cold winter in Seattle! Use it in the night on my car saves me 5 minutes in the morning trying to scrape the frost off my windscreen. Caution: do not store this item in your car after a nights use, because it is wet and would make your car interior very humid. Leave it indoors in a warm house and let it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, great coverage, attractive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several different umbrellas from Amazon for the upcoming rainy season. I purchased the Wilson Hope 62" Umbrella based on overall positive reviews on Amazon, price ([...]), free shipping, canopy feature, and attractiveness. So far I've used this umbrella several times and I'm very happy with the purchase. It is sturdy, well constructed, provides great coverage, and is attractive without screaming for attention. I don't use the protective cover it comes with, and I like a hook design handle instead of a straight stick, but those are mere personal preferences. I recommend this product at the price I purchased it for, anything higher I'd have research my other options before deciding.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Fits My 2012 Toyota Camry Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use it in the frost yet, we'll have more soon enough though. I did a dry run and looks like it will be a good thing to keep in my trunk at work so I can see driving home in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Jakesdad

customer_reviews.title: Works really great
customer_reviews.text: Between the elastic straps that go over the mirrors, the flaps that go inside the doors and the 3 magnets that are located on the bottom nest to the lower windshield and hood, this cover holds very well and is relatively easy to put on and take off. Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Windshield cover
customer_reviews.text: This Sun Cover is Helpful, but it covers only the front windshield therefore it can reduce only about 50% of the heat. I suggest Cozyzone also offers another cover for Rear windshield.
customer_reviews.author: geow888

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son because his car is parked outside. It is MUCH quicker and handier than having to scrape your windows every morning!
customer_reviews.author: my

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit but works
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't even begin to fit a Toyota Tacoma properly, but it does the job. We have to loop the bands over the mirrors, but put it on upside down in order for it to cover the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: C. FIELD

customer_reviews.title: Very effective sun shield
customer_reviews.text: dislike putting the flappy bits in the door but even in a wind everything stayed in place. it's a bit fiddly lining it up on my windscreen - Transit Connect and tends to ride up during installation but once properly fitted it works like a dream
customer_reviews.author: Jasi C

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present to evening staff
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for all my evening shift workers. So when it's time to go home they can just pull this off warm up cars an go. They all loved the idea an that I thought about them. I have one of my own that I use in summer also to deflect sun rays out of my car.
customer_reviews.author: DiAnna L

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. With my camera holder and dashcam I needed something to go on the outside and it fit the bill!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela J Kempfer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Jeep Liberty and this fit good on my windshield for the most part. My entire car was frosted one morning except for my windshield because of this cover. The sides had alittle frost but overall this is a great product and easy to put on!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: After spending plenty of money on attractive but cheaply made umbrellas that all seemed to: be too small to keep me dry with heavy rain and wind, and easily broken after heavy winds, I decided to try this one. This umbrella is fantastic. 62" in size, certainly big enough for 2 people, and quality construction. I used it recently at a funeral where the weather was pouring rain and 40 mph gusts, and this umbrella did the job. I was dry and happy. The coffee color, trimmed in pink with the pink breast cancer hope ribbon is just lovely as well. Buy this quality product; it is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: Great product from a real user
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Ordered one, found it to work very well on a Ford GT-40 and ordered another for a Taurus.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Evans

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit completely...either I cover the top of my window or my windshield wipers.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice, can’t wait to try it on my car for this winter!! It seems really easy to cover the window, block and clean the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the ice off
customer_reviews.text: Does a really good job at keeping the frost and ice off the windshield. However, I had to do a little "modification" so that it wouldn't blow off when the wind is blowing strongly. It pulls out from where the door closes on it.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Love it, easy to use and store, exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my Taurus. The first time I used it, I broke the elastic that goes around the rear view mirror, forgetting it would be wet and frozen. Works anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good Against frost too
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend who doesn’t have indoor parking and even though it hasn’t snowed yet he says it has been helpful in preventing frost from forming on his windshield so theres that! My boyfriend was afraid to use it in chicago though while visiting me because he didn’t want it stolen, which would be easy considering it just slips over the side view mirrors. Overall a good product, its pretty thick (probably 1/4 in) of fabric and seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over a year now, works great! Easy to use and really keeps the frost off of the window
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Missing the Wheels straps
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I just should but the one with the wheels strap. The wind mess it up with this one sometimes and uncover my car.
customer_reviews.author: milenasm80

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Could use a bolster to keep it in the window. When it;s windy it will pull out. I added a magnet to the top.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's supposed to and keeps my windshield clear of snow. In a higher wind area I appreciate the magnets to help keep it in place. I do wish the flaps for tucking into the car doors were just a bit longer, it would make securing it easier.
customer_reviews.author: SilverWolf13

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise easy to put on and take off, but is rotten in about 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Update. It is Aug 8, 2108 so we have used it for a little over one month. The black trim is rooted and the elastic is stretched out. I do not recommend unless you want to purchase a new one monthly. We purchased it to reflect the sun in Phoenix as our truck will not fit in garage. Our wipers don’t last but a few months. The only problem is the magnets are not strong enough to hold it down. With the winds they blow off. Otherwise easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron milne

customer_reviews.title: iPod Nano 2G iSkin case
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is exactly what I had in mind. There is the silicone skin complete cover with a plastic shell on the front. The shell covers the display and there is a cut out for the click wheel that is covered by the silicone skin. The system comes with three silicone skins ("clear", black, and glow in the dark)and one shell. there is the option of a belt clip (I don't use)that works well too. The bottom is open for both connections. The hold button on top is a little tough to get if your finger nails are very short however. There is an adapter as well for the iPod dock. For me this is the perfect case.
customer_reviews.author: XRAYMAN

customer_reviews.title: have a Lincoln MKZ and it barely fits. The ...
customer_reviews.text: have a Lincoln MKZ and it barely fits. The elastic strap broke when I was trying to get if off on an icy day. However, it does serve it' purpose and will use it in the summer. For the price, it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lisa516

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the windshield clean
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my suv. A little small for my truck 1500 Silverado
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need improvement.
customer_reviews.text: No magnets on the top. Mirrors rubber bands too low for 2017 RAV4.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works very nice for my daughters car. We live in Michigan and it has helped tremendously with keeping snow and ice off. Very convenient in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Misty R Sedore

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift so I can’t comment on the fit. The quality of the material is much better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Payne

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: quality is good enough,there are two layers and thick,I am not sure whether the size is good enough for SUV or not,because it is.not.snowing,and I think.it.is.not used in.winter,summer is ok.
customer_reviews.author: mila

customer_reviews.title: Windshield cover
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach. Saves a lot of work on snow days.
customer_reviews.author: John Romero

customer_reviews.title: Buying another one
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for protecting outside windshield and wiper blades from sun, rain, hail. The wraps that go around mirrors work well, but the flap intended to be closed in door kept cover in place during 70mph winds. Buying 2nd one for truck.
customer_reviews.author: C Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good for snow.
customer_reviews.text: It's an OK product. Hopefully it works better when it snows but as far as keeping your car cooler in summer is not any improvement from the inside window shade. The magnets need to be on top instead on bottom. I will update when I get snow, fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! Easy to put on and take off. Stores well in trunk of car. Does the job! Allows me to have more time to do whatever and not have to go into the freezing cold and scrape snow off my windshield! Would definitely recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent product
customer_reviews.text: If it’s a windy day, the cover will blow half way down the window making it pointless. But with no wind, even heavy snow it helped a lot. Made leaving the house faster for work with no scraping.
customer_reviews.author: Monica kalasky

product_meta.title: Cosyzone Windshield Snow Ice Cover Winter Frost Cover for Car Wind-Proof Magnetic Edge Keeps Ice Snow Frost Off Fits Most Vehicle
product_meta.description:
Color:silverWant to keep your car cooling and avoid heatstroke due to the high temperatures? 
Cosyzone Car Sun Shade helps your beloved car to avoid extreme heat and sun damage.

Why chose the Windshield Sun Shade from Cosy Zone Store? 
1. Extreme UV rays often cause fading, cracking, and serious damage to your car interior, with Car Sunshade, you will surely have a long lasting and beautiful car interior for years! 
2.Cosy Zone car sunshade is coated with Silver nylon that blocks 99% of the UV rays. Pop up design that so easy to use. Installs & folds in seconds. What a breeze! 
3.Feel more comfort on a road trip or vacation, park your car under the sun and install your Car Sunshade and get back on a COOLER Car! It's Amazing! 
4.Perfectly fits most car windshields and it's available in Jumbo size that will surely fit in your vehicle.
feature_bullets: KEEP YOURSELF COOL: Our windshield sun shade protects you from the sun's heat and harmful UV radiation rays. Keeping you cooler and happier when you step back into your car.

PROTECT YOUR CAR: High quality and durable sun blocker screen protector to maintain your car interior temperature. No more burning steering wheels, scorching dashboards, or hot interiors and leather seats burning.

DIMENSIONS: 58.6 Inch(width) X 47.2 Inch(height). Fits really well with windshields that DO NOT EXCEED INSIDE MEASUREMENT of 58.6" x 47.2"(148*120cm). Make sure you measure your windshield to ensure you get the right size.

EASIEST INTALLATION: Fastens easily by opening car doors inserting 2 door flaps inside, closing door holding cover, then using elastic straps to keep it in place. Three steps to prevent wind and theft.

90 DAYS 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We are committed to make it RIGHT for you. Contact us with the Concern and We will Find out a Solution for it or Money back Guarantee If for any reason you're not happy with the sunshade.
